oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hatch Show Print Posters (proof)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Color separation; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (split fountain, yellow to orange, on white) featuring metal photoplates of Hatch Show Print posters. This poster features the first application of color in a multiple color poster. It is probably a proof.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:medium: posters; proofs (prints by function); window cards;
